appName: Mini Golf Master - Fun Golf Challenges
displayName: Mini Golf Master - Fun Golf Challenges
display_name: Mini Golf Master - Fun Golf Challenges
display_long_description:
Experience the ultimate virtual golf adventure with Mini Golf Master, the most immersive and realistic VR mini-golf game on Meta Quest! Perfect for casual players and golf enthusiasts, this game brings the excitement of mini-golf to life with detailed courses, lifelike ball physics, and intuitive VR controls.

Key Features:
⛳ Immersive Golf Courses
Step onto stunning virtual greens with beautifully crafted courses inspired by iconic mini-golf themes. From serene garden courses to futuristic layouts, every hole offers a unique golf challenge to keep you hooked.

🏌️ Realistic Golf Ball Physics
Feel the precision of real golf with lifelike ball physics that react to every swing. Fine-tune your shots, master tricky angles.

🌄 Breathtaking Golf Environments
Immerse yourself in vibrant, high-quality visuals that transport you to stunning golf landscapes. Whether you’re playing on a sunny tropical course or a glowing moonlit green, every moment feels real.

🎯 Challenging Golf Obstacles
Tackle creative and challenging mini-golf obstacles, from spinning windmills to narrow ramps. Each level is designed to test your skills and offer the fun that mini-golf is known for.

Why Mini Golf Master?

The ultimate VR golf game for players of all skill levels.
Combines the challenge of traditional mini-golf with stunning virtual reality.
Fun, relaxing, and the perfect way to practice your putting skills in a lifelike golf environment.
